attributes.action: prohibit schools from teaching and promoting pseudo-science.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently there has been coverage in the news over schools teaching Brain Gym.  The problem behind teaching pseudo-science, is the nonsense it teaches to vulnerable children, and the cost to the taxpayer.  We propose that schools be prohibited from including pseudo-science in the curriculum due to the problems it can cause.
